
    SELECT 
        p.Id AS [AnswerId],
        p.ParentId AS [QuestionId],
        p.CreationDate AS [AnswerCreationDate],
        p.Score AS [AnswerScore],
        p.Body AS [AnswerBody],
        p.OwnerUserId AS [AnswerAuthorId],
        p.OwnerDisplayName AS [AnswerAuthorName]
    FROM 
        Posts p
    WHERE 
        p.PostTypeId = 2  -- Answer posts
        AND p.ParentId IN (57503578,57509118,57808152,58630097,58933795,59060710,59302035,60303168,61188927,61208421,61268184,61823476,61863729,61979870,62087265,62167773,62370850,62908594,63159962,63426356,63803136,64078671,64169578,64727916,64745031,64793785,64859065,64930068,65205928,65345432,65353108,65855054,65893608,66088277,66182837,66308908,66358482,66877085,66970875,67107607,67369480,67472935,67800532,68005219,68244484,68303446,68303502,68410854,68634487,68692017,68759500,68767043,68812228,68909767,69126323,69160610,69223474,69255724,69314615,69385940,69520599,69646986,69770836,69934707,70332762,70386650,70478320,70556460,70619765,70765867,71525489,71741116,72278554,72478547,72919393,73143492,73255602,73394214,73497316,73497571,73543207,73626276,73853178,74051795,74112918,74114983,74164817,74206683,74349847,74572309,74812256,74869907,74912797,74927029,74973574,75290662,75322937,75324115,75386396,75399577,75438906,75478713,75559868,75607496,75733616,75739960,75812749,75838160,75839566,75991359,75996853,76029565,76151656,76181798,76259462,76262960,76266314,76279262,76303782,76312191,76324589,76431545,76512235,76570482,76739418,76746551,76938952,76969053,77099483,77101038,77158031,77237797,77255765,77395114)
    ORDER BY 
        p.ParentId, p.CreationDate;
